alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Foster; La Moure; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 8:46PM CST until January 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Dickey, Foster, LaMoure and Stutsman Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until Noon Thursday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility through the remainder of this evening. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing.
